Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-43860 affecting package kernel for versions less than 6.6.47.1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-43860 affecting package kernel for versions less than 6.6.47.1-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.
